vocabulary.question: I ( ) a dog. His name is Max.
My mother ( ) me a new bike for my birthday.
A: What time is it? B: It's ( ) o'clock.
Can you ( ) me with my homework?
I have a ( ) cat and a black dog.
She ( ) to the library last Saturday.
I like to play ( ) with my friends.
The ( ) is very big and beautiful.
I need to buy ( ) pencils for school.
My father ( ) a newspaper every morning.
We ( ) a picnic in the park yesterday.
My school is ( ) from my house.
I ( ) my teeth before going to bed.
There ( ) a cat under the table.

grammar.question: There ( ) many books on the desk.

reading.passage: My name is Tom. I am 12 years old. I live in Tokyo with my family. I have one brother and one sister. I like playing soccer on weekends.

subQuestions.question: How old is Tom?
What does Tom like to do on weekends?

reading.passage: My school is near my house. I go to school by bus every day. My favorite subject is English. I also like mathematics and science. I have five friends. We play together after school.

subQuestions.question: How does the student go to school?
What is the student's favorite subject?

reading.passage: My family likes going to the beach. We go there in summer. We play in the water and eat ice cream. My father plays volleyball. My mother reads a book. My sister and I build sandcastles.

subQuestions.question: When does the family go to the beach?
What does the father do at the beach?

reading.passage: John has a pet dog named Bingo. Bingo is brown and very friendly. Every day, John takes Bingo for a walk in the park. Bingo likes to play fetch with a ball. John also gives Bingo food and water.

subQuestions.question: What color is Bingo?
What game does Bingo like to play?

reading.passage: I have a birthday party on Saturday. My friends are coming to my house. We will eat cake and ice cream. We will play games and sing songs. It will be fun!

subQuestions.question: When is the birthday party?
What will they do at the party?

reading.passage: Mary is a student. She studies hard every day. She goes to school in the morning and comes home in the afternoon. She does her homework after school. In the evening, she watches TV for a little while.

subQuestions.question: When does Mary go to school?
When does Mary do her homework?

reading.passage: In summer, I like to swim at the pool. The water is cool and clean. Many children come to the pool. We play water games and have fun. I also eat watermelon after swimming.

subQuestions.question: Where does the child swim?
What does the child eat after swimming?

reading.passage: I have a small room. My bed is next to the window. My desk is in the corner. I have a lamp on my desk. My bookshelf is on the wall. I like my room very much.

subQuestions.question: Where is the bed?
Where is the desk?

reading.passage: My grandmother likes cooking. She makes delicious food. Every Sunday, I visit her house. She teaches me how to cook. We make cookies and cakes together. It is very fun.

subQuestions.question: What does the grandmother like to do?
When does the child visit the grandmother?

reading.passage: Tom is a football player. He plays for a big team. He practices every day. He is very good at football. Many people like watching him play. He is famous.

subQuestions.question: What sport does Tom play?
How often does Tom practice?

reading.passage: Lisa loves animals. She has three pets at home. She has a dog, a cat, and a bird. She feeds them every morning. She plays with them after school. Her favorite pet is the dog.

subQuestions.question: How many pets does Lisa have?
What is Lisa's favorite pet?

reading.passage: Every morning, I wake up at 7 o'clock. I brush my teeth and wash my face. Then I eat breakfast with my family. After breakfast, I go to school. School starts at 8:30.

subQuestions.question: What time does the person wake up?
What time does school start?

reading.passage: Spring is my favorite season. The weather is warm and sunny. Many flowers bloom in spring. I like to go to the park and see cherry blossoms. Birds sing beautiful songs.

subQuestions.question: What is the person's favorite season?
What does the person like to see in the park?

reading.passage: My brother likes reading books. He reads every night before bed. His favorite books are adventure stories. He has more than 50 books in his room. Sometimes he lets me borrow his books.

subQuestions.question: When does the brother read books?
What kind of books does he like?

reading.passage: Last weekend, my family went to the zoo. We saw many animals like lions, elephants, and monkeys. The monkeys were very funny. They jumped and played. We took many pictures.

subQuestions.question: Where did the family go?
Which animals were funny?

reading.passage: I help my mother at home. I clean my room every day. On Saturday, I help wash the dishes. On Sunday, I water the plants. My mother is happy when I help.

subQuestions.question: What does the person do every day?
When does the person water the plants?

reading.passage: Today is a rainy day. I cannot play outside. I stay at home and read a book. I also draw pictures. Later, I will play board games with my sister.

subQuestions.question: What is the weather like today?
What will the person do later?

reading.passage: My best friend is Ken. We have been friends for five years. We go to the same school. We like playing video games together. Ken is very kind and funny.

subQuestions.question: Who is the person's best friend?
How long have they been friends?

reading.passage: I want to be a doctor when I grow up. I like helping people. I study hard at school. My favorite subjects are science and biology. I hope my dream comes true.

subQuestions.question: What does the person want to be?
What are the person's favorite subjects?

reading.passage: Yesterday was my sister's birthday. We had a party at home. We ate pizza and birthday cake. My sister got many presents. She was very happy. It was a wonderful day.

subQuestions.question: Whose birthday was it?
What did they eat?

listening.question: Listen and choose the correct answer.
What is the person talking about?
Where is the conversation taking place?
What time does the shop open?
How many people are in the family?
What is the weather like?
What does the person want to buy?
What day is it today?
What color is the car?
What is the boy doing?
